text: James Cama Sr. (December 8, 1957 â€“ August 15, 2014) was an American martial arts practitioner and teacher. He was known for practicing Wing Chun and the Southern Praying Mantis moves. Cama wrote a single book, covering the Buddha Hand Wing Chun system, which was published on August 14, 2014. ==References== ==Other websites== * Late Cama's Wing Chun website Category:1957 births Category:2014 deaths Category:American martial artists Category:Educators from New York (state) Category:Writers from New York (state) Category:Sportspeople from New York (state)
